Some actions may require some time to complete, for example:
Organizing a dictionary
Exporting a
Analyzing all documents of a folder

The progress of such an action is indicated by a so-called progress window (see ). windowsOrganizing Dictionary sample window
Organizing Dictionary sample window
Figure shows Organizing Dictionary sample window
This type of window can be minimized to let you do other work in . When the action is completed, a message with the result of the action is displayed.
If you want to interrupt the action, double-click the system icon of the progress window. In the following message window, you can confirm the cancellation request.
